Package possportstore

package possportstore
  • Class
    Description
    Accessories
    Represents an accessory product within the inventory.
    Accessories.TypeAccessories
    Enumeration defining the specific categories of accessories available.
    Clothe
    Represents a clothing product within the inventory.
    Clothe.TypeClothe
    Enumeration defining the specific categories of clothing available.
    CurrentSale
    Manages the current transaction, including the shopping cart, discounts, and total calculation.
    CurrentSale.CartItem
    Represents an item line in the shopping cart (Product + Quantity + Discount).
    Product
    Represents a generic product in the inventory.
    Sale
    Manages the history of sales invoices and their file persistence.
    Sale.Invoice
    Inner class representing a single sales invoice.
    Sale.InvoiceItem
    Helper class to store a snapshot of a sold item within an invoice.
    Shoe
    Represents a shoe product within the inventory.
    Shoe.TypeShoe
    Enumeration defining the specific categories of shoes available.
    StoreSystem
    Main Controller (Facade) for the Application.
    User
    Represents a system user (e.g., Administrator or Cashier).
    User.Role
    Defines the available roles within the system.
    UserManager
    Manages User entities, including authentication, CRUD operations, and file persistence.
